questions: Through this chapter you are able to understand what is friction. On the basis of friction ask why do you sprinkle fine powder on the carrom board. Why your parents poured few drops of oil on the hinges of a door.
answers: Actually friction is a one kind of force caused by the irregularities on the two surface in contact. We have to do lot of work in some cases. We need to decrease the friction and in some cases we need to increase the friction. While playing carrom board we need smooth and slippary movement so we sprinkle fine powder to decrease the friction. Same as for the smooth movement of doors oil drops are poured on the hinges of a door.
